According to Wilks in the fourth edition of  Statistical Methods in the Atmospheric Sciences (2019), Cluster Analysis is a unsupervised learning learning paradigm that involves separating data—whose identities or traits are unknown—into different groups. 

Reference: https://www.sciencedirect.com/topics/earth-and-planetary-sciences/cluster-analysis

Credit Scoring is a numerical system that lenders (i.e. banks) utilize to gauge the likelihood that a borrower will be able to consistently make payments. In essence, a score is assigned to various selected factors that are related to an applicant's creditabilities.

Shopify defines Customer Segmentation as a process of dividing customers into groups based on common characteristics. This enables companies to cater and market to each group effectively and appropriately.

Reference: https://www.shopify.com/encyclopedia/customer-segmentation#:~:text=Customer%20segmentation%20is%20the%20process,Number%20of%20employees
A system used to estimate customer demand over a predetermined period given historical data (e.g. sales data.)

A set of techniques used to reduce the amount of input variables in a dataset as higher dimensionality entails a longer training duration and a more compute-intensive predictive modeling task; the curse of dimensionality.
Document Classification is used to categorize documents that have similar attributes.

According to Liddy (2005) in Document Retrieval, Automatic, Document Retreival is a computerized process that produces a relevance-ranked list of documents based on the inquirer's request. This is commonly found in web-based search engines.

Identify facial patterns, key facial features, and characterize the contours of detected faces in an image or video.
Also known as pre-processing, Feature Engineering  is a process of transforming input variables to be fed into a predictive model. It is mainly used to improve training efficiencies.
